EmailTemplate.subject: Deal Registration submitted for from your Solution Provider {!Deal_Registration__c.Channel_Partner_Company_Name__c} for the Engineering Frictionless 2020 Program.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Deal_Registration__c.OwnerFullName} ,
The NCR Interact Deal Registration Program has received a submission from your Solution Provider {!Deal_Registration__c.Channel_Partner_Company_Name__c} for the Engineering Frictionless 2020 Program.
Details :
Channel Partner Company Name: {!Deal_Registration__c.Channel_Partner_Company_Name__c} Name of Account/Financial Institution: {!Deal_Registration__c.Name_of_Account_Financial_Institution__c} Projected Opportunity Value: {!Deal_Registration__c.Projected_Opportunity_Value__c}
Your approval or rejection is required before this Deal Registration can be moved into an Opportunity within NSC or set aside.
If you are rejecting, please check one of the following reasons:
o This was a previous NCR Account within the past 8 years, does not qualify o This is an existing named account, does not qualify o Value is insufficient to qualify for Deal Registration o Region/country is not part of the Deal Registration Program
If this submission changes, is canceled, or you have any question regarding this submission, please contact the NCR Interact team at team.channels@ncr.com or interact.operations@ncr.com.
Sincerely, NCR Interact Partner Programs Team
